bug.author: aaronmarkham
bug.summary: empty directory created when running server on invalid model file location
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Overview</denchmark-h>
If you accidentally try to run server on a file that doesn't exist, mms creates the folder. This is messy. <denchmark-h:h2>Recreate</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>mxnet-model-server --models densenet=some-file-that-does-not-exist.model </denchmark-code>
